meanings.definition: A person highly skilled in music or another artistic pursuit.
meanings.sent1: The virtuosas performed a beautiful symphony at the concert.
meanings.sent2: Many virtuosas have dedicated their lives to mastering their craft.
meanings.sent3: The virtuosas decided to have a musical duel to see who was the best.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the piano keys like virtuosas in a grand ballroom.
meanings.sent5: The virtuosas' talent was like a shining beacon in the world of music.

meanings.sent1: The concert featured a group of virtuosas playing different instruments.
meanings.sent2: The virtuosas received a standing ovation for their outstanding performance.
meanings.sent3: The virtuosas gathered to form a band and rock the stage.
meanings.sent4: The virtuosas' harmonious melodies filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: Each of the virtuosas brought a unique talent to the ensemble.
